blogPost.excerpt: Yogile is a sleek photo management app that lets you store an unlimited number of photos without worrying about running out of storage on your phone or computer.
blogPost.body: Yogile is a sleek photo management app that lets you store an unlimited number of photos without worrying about running out of storage on your phone or computer.
blogPost.title: Yogile - Photo storage simplified
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Yogile是一款时尚的照片管理应用，它可以让你存储无限数量的照片，而不用担心手机或电脑的存储空间不够用。
Yogile是一款時尚的照片管理應用，它可以讓你存儲無限數量的照片，而不用擔心手機或電腦的存儲空間不夠用。
